messages.message: Invalid KTXastcDecodeMode value. The value must be either "rgb9e5" or "unorm8".
messages.details: The value is "unorm88" but the value must be either "rgb9e5" or "unorm8".

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
